# DeepLint Skills

<!-- Thanks to: @rsionnach/sloppylint for inspiration -->

Simple skill descriptions for using DeepLint with Claude AI.

## Available Skills

- **[deeplint.md](./deeplint.md)** - Core DeepLint tool usage and strategies

## What are Skills?

Skills are concise descriptions of tools and how to use them effectively with AI assistants like Claude. They provide:
- Tool description and purpose
- Basic invocation patterns
- Available options and strategies

## Acknowledgments

Inspired by [@rsionnach/sloppylint](https://github.com/rsionnach/sloppylint).
